markdownRemark.html:
Setting up

While developing different blockchain tools, the requirement of spinning up a new full node for testing comes up quite often.

In order to speed up this process, I’ve come to build and run bitcoin-core inside a docker container. I’ve found the images maintained by @ruimarinho very usefull and working straight OOTB.

https://github.com/ruimarinho/docker-bitcoin-core
